name: Dumbbell Lifting
details: Most of us have a pair of dumbbells lying around. But most of us are also guilty of letting them collect dust in the corner.

name: Lower Leg Exercises
details: Flexibility is one of those things that many people talk about dreamily. Like, being flexible would be nice, but sigh, itâ€™s just a pipe dream.

name: Basketball
details: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball through the defender's hoop

name: Racing
details: In sport, racing is a competition of speed, in which competitors try to complete a given task in the shortest amount of time. Typically this involves traversing some distance, but it can be any other task involving speed to reach a specific goal.

name: Meditation
details: When we meditate, we inject far-reaching and long-lasting benefits into our lives: We lower our stress levels, we get to know our pain, we connect better, we improve our focus, and we're kinder to ourselves.

name: Cycling
details: Cycling, also, when on a two-wheeled bicycle, called bicycling or biking, is the use of cycles for transport, recreation, exercise or sport.

name: Push Up
details: The push-up is a common calisthenics exercise beginning from the prone position. By raising and lowering the body using the arms, push-ups exercise the pectoral muscles, triceps, and anterior deltoids, with ancillary benefits to the rest of the deltoids.

name: Rope Jumping
details: What is jumping rope? Jumping rope is a form of exercise that involves swinging a rope around your body and jumping over it as it passes under your feet.

name: Weight Lifting
details: Weight training is a common type of strength training for developing the strength and size of skeletal muscles. It uses the force of gravity in the form of weighted bars, dumbbells or weight stacks.
